name: CI - Maven Build

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - '**'
  pull_request:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout código
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Mostrar estrutura de arquivos
        run: |
          echo "Estrutura de arquivos do repositório:"
          pwd
          ls -R

      - name: Set up JDK 21
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          distribution: 'temurin'
          java-version: '21'

      - name: Build com Maven
        run: mvn clean package -DskipTests
